020package org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer;
021
022import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.DEPRECATED;
023import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
024
025import javax.annotation.processing.Filer;
026import javax.tools.JavaFileObject;
027import java.io.File;
028import java.io.IOException;
029import java.nio.file.Path;
030
031import org.apiguardian.api.API;
032import org.tquadrat.foundation.annotation.ClassVersion;
033import org.tquadrat.foundation.javacomposer.internal.JavaFileImpl;
034
035/**
036 *  The definition for a Java file containing a single top level class.
037 *
038 *  @author Square,Inc.
039 *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
040 *  @version $Id: JavaFile.java 854 2021-01-20 22:44:45Z tquadrat $
041 *  @since 0.0.5
042 *
043 *  @UMLGraph.link
044 */
045@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: JavaFile.java 854 2021-01-20 22:44:45Z tquadrat $" )
046@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
047public sealed interface JavaFile
048    permits JavaFileImpl
049{
050        /*---------------*\
051    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
052        \*---------------*/
053    /**
054     *  The definition for a builder for an instance of an implementation of
055     *  {@link JavaFile}.
056     *
057     *  @author Square,Inc.
058     *  @modified Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
059     *  @version $Id: JavaFile.java 854 2021-01-20 22:44:45Z tquadrat $
060     *  @since 0.0.5
061     *
062     *  @UMLGraph.link
063     */
064    @SuppressWarnings( "InnerClassOfInterface" )
065    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: JavaFile.java 854 2021-01-20 22:44:45Z tquadrat $" )
066    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.5" )
067    public static sealed interface Builder
068        permits JavaFileImpl.BuilderImpl
069    {
070            /*---------*\
071        ====** Methods **======================================================
072            \*---------*/
073        /**
074         *  Adds text to the file comment.
075         *
076         *  @param  format  The format.
077         *  @param  args    The arguments.
078         *  @return This {@code Builder} instance.
079         */
080        public Builder addFileComment( final String format, final Object... args );
081
082        /**
083         *  Adds a static import.
084         *
085         *  @param  clazz   The class.
086         *  @param  names   The names of the elements from the given class that
087         *      are to be imported.
088         *  @return This {@code Builder} instance.
089         */
090        public Builder addStaticImport( final Class<?> clazz, final String... names );
091
092        /**
093         *  Adds a static import.
094         *
095         *  @param  className   The class.
096         *  @param  names   The names of the elements from the given class that
097         *      are to be imported.
098         *  @return This {@code Builder} instance.
099         */
100        public Builder addStaticImport( final ClassName className, final String... names );
101
102        /**
103         *  Adds a static import for the given {@code enum} value.
104         *
105         *  @param  constant    The {@code enum} value.
106         *  @return This {@code Builder} instance.
107         */
108        public Builder addStaticImport( final Enum<?> constant );
109
110        /**
111         *  Builds an instance of
112         *  {@link JavaFile}
113         *  from this builder.
114         *
115         *  @return The {@code JavaFile} instance.
116         */
117        public JavaFile build();
118
119        /**
120         *  Sets the indentation value.
121         *
122         *  @param  indent  The indentation.
123         *  @return This {@code Builder} instance.
124         *
125         *  @deprecated The indentation is determined by the layout only; it
126         *      cannot be overwritten. This implementation of this method does
127         *      nothing.
128         */
129        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
130        public Builder indent( final String indent );
131
132        /**
133         *  Sets the layout for the
134         *  {@link JavaFile}.
135         *
136         *  @param  layout  The layout.
137         *  @return This {@code Builder} instance.
138         *
139         *  @deprecated Got obsolete with the use of
140         *      {@link JavaComposer}
141         *      as the factory.
142         */
143        @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
144        public Builder layout( Layout layout );
145
146        /**
147         *  <p>{@summary Call this to omit imports for classes from the package
148         *  {@code java.lang}, such as
149         *  {@link String}
150         *  or
151         *  {@link Math}.}</p>
152         *  <p>By default, JavaComposer explicitly imports types in
153         *  {@code java.lang} to defend against naming conflicts. Suppose an
154         *  (ill-advised) class is named {@code com.example.String}. When
155         *  {@code java.lang} imports are skipped, generated code in
156         *  {@code com.example} that references {@code java.lang.String} will
157         *  get {@code com.example.String} instead.</p>
158         *
159         *  @param  flag    {@code true} means that the imports for classes
160         *      from the package {@code java.lang} are skipped, {@code false}
161         *      means that the imports are added explicitly.
162         *  @return This {@code Builder} instance.
163         */
164        public Builder skipJavaLangImports( final boolean flag );
165    }
166    //  interface Builder
167
168        /*---------*\
169    ====** Methods **==========================================================
170        \*---------*/
171    /**
172     *  Creates a builder for a new instance of {@code JavaFile} from the given
173     *  package name and class definition.
174     *
175     *  @param  packageName The package name.
176     *  @param  typeSpec    The class definition.
177     *  @return The builder.
178     *
179     *  @deprecated Replaced by
180     *      {@link JavaComposer#javaFileBuilder(CharSequence, TypeSpec)}.
181     */
182    @SuppressWarnings( "removal" )
183    @Deprecated( since = "0.2.0", forRemoval = true )
184    @API( status = DEPRECATED, since = "0.0.5" )
185    public static Builder builder( final CharSequence packageName, final TypeSpec typeSpec )
186    {
187        final var retValue = JavaFileImpl.builder( packageName, typeSpec );
188
189        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
190        return retValue;
191    }   //  builder()
192
193    /**
194     *  {@inheritDoc}
195     */
196    @Override
197    public boolean equals( final Object o );
198
199    /**
200     *  {@inheritDoc}
201     */
202    @Override
203    public int hashCode();
204
205    /**
206     *  Returns a new builder that is initialised with this {@code JavaFile}
207     *  instance.
208     *
209     *  @return The new builder.
210     */
211    public Builder toBuilder();
212
213    /**
214     *  Creates a
215     *  {@link JavaFileObject}
216     *  from this instance of {@code JavaFile}.
217     *
218     *  @return The {@code JavaFileObject}.
219     */
220    public JavaFileObject toJavaFileObject();
221
222    /**
223     *  {@inheritDoc}
224     */
225    @Override
226    public String toString();
227
228    /**
229     *  Writes this {@code JavaFile} instance to the given
230     *  {@link Appendable}.
231     *
232     *  @param  out The output target.
233     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when writing to the output
234     *      target.
235     */
236    public void writeTo( final Appendable out ) throws IOException;
237
238    /**
239     *  Writes this {@code JavaFile} instance to the given target folder as a
240     *  UTF-8 file, using the standard directory structure for the packages.
241     *
242     *  @param  directory   The target folder.
243     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when writing to the output
244     *      target.
245     */
246    public void writeTo( final File directory ) throws IOException;
247
248    /**
249     *  Writes  {@code JavaFile} instance to the given
250     *  {@link Filer}
251     *  instance.
252     *
253     *  @param  filer   The target.
254     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when writing to the output
255     *      target.
256     */
257    public void writeTo( final Filer filer ) throws IOException;
258
259    /**
260     *  Writes this {@code JavaFile} instance to the given target folder as a
261     *  UTF-8 file, using the standard directory structure for the packages.
262     *
263     *  @param  directory   The target folder.
264     *  @throws IOException A problem occurred when writing to the output
265     *      target.
266     */
267    public void writeTo( final Path directory ) throws IOException;
268}
269//  interface JavaFile
270
271/*
272 *  End of File
273 */
